attributes.action: Commission an independent review into GP access
attributes.additional_details:
Please follow this link to read our full summary of the key facts and more information that we believe should be part of a wider debate on this issue

https://www.dauk.org/news/2021/10/05/petition-to-parliament-to-debate-gp-access/
attributes.background:
Patients are struggling to access safe GP care in a timely manner. Equally, GP teams are overwhelmed and struggling to meet patient demands.

If general practice fails, the NHS fails and the wider issues around these struggles need to be addressed and meaningful solutions found

rejection.details: We can only accept petitions from named individuals, not organisations.
